skills.skill: Technical Proficiency (Microsoft Office, Loan Origination Software)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance, training, and quality control for USDA 502 Direct loan packaging program
Respond to inquiries from participating Qualified Packages and Certified Employers
Assist in outreach and relationship development, especially for those with Spanish as their preferred language
Assist in training as part of the new Homeownership Program Team
Maintain compliance with signed Memorandum of Understandings by RCAC and Qualified Employers
Promote and facilitate partnerships to maximize limited resources
Prepare activity and outcome reports as required

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Housing Development, Mortgage Lending, or a related field (Master's preferred)
USDA 502 Direct packaging certification (to be obtained within 3 months of hire)
